aws_wafregional_web_acl.description: Provides a AWS WAF Regional web access control group (ACL) resource for use with ALB.

default_action.description: The action that you want AWS WAF Regional to take when a request doesn't match the criteria in any of the rules that are associated with the web ACL.

metric_name.description: The name or description for the Amazon CloudWatch metric of this web ACL.

name.description: The name or description of the web ACL.

logging_configuration.description: Configuration block to enable WAF logging. Detailed below.

rule.description: Set of configuration blocks containing rules for the web ACL. Detailed below.

arn.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the WAF Regional WebACL.

id.description: The ID of the WAF Regional WebACL.
